title: Create GiveBacks-specific documentation with intro email template
description:
Research GiveBacks platform thoroughly and create documentation specific to HZRPC's use case. Include:
- How GiveBacks works (Shop to Give, crowdfunding, A-Thon tools)
- Setup steps for HZRPC
- An introductory email template that can be shared with friends and families to get them onboarded

Email to daveh@outlook.com.

actions.note: Requested by Dave via email reply. No rush.

Created comprehensive GiveBacks guide Word doc with: platform overview, Shop to Give guide, campaign tools, pricing, setup steps, family email template, social media templates, and promotion strategy. Emailed to daveh@outlook.com via Fastmail with attachment.
